Paragraph.Text: Laser Energy Transmitters (or LETs) are the backbone of your power delivery network.

LETs come in a variety of upgrades. Generally speaking, the higher tiers of LET will allow you to transmit more power, more quickly. All current tiers of LET are limited to a maximum transmission range of 64.
-Higher Tiers are significantly better. Upgrade whenever you can.
-Emitters touching multiple Power Storage Blocks will charge faster.
-For cheap, unbuffered power, simply aim a LET an another one.
-Many machines can be powered straight from LETs, but this gives no margin for power dropouts.
-Use in conjunction with Power Storage Blocks to smooth out hiccups in power delivery.
